note.p: Birth: Carlow, County Carlow, Ireland (21 December 1821)
Death: His residence, 12 Northbrook Road, Dublin, Ireland (31 October 1897)
Career: Fellow, Trinity College, Dublin; Professor of Geology, University of Dublin
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1897-1898 vol 62 pp xxix-xxxvii signed by D J C
References: G Ferrari and A McConnell, 'Robert Mallet and the 'Great Neapolitan earthquake' of 1857 in NR 2005 vol 59 pp 45-64
